description: Explore how Arbitrum and transaction batching are transforming Ethereum by enhancing scalability, reducing costs, and maintaining decentralization within decentralized finance (DeFi).
keywords: Ethereum, Arbitrum, transaction batching, Layer 2, scalability, decentralized finance, DeFi, smart contracts, dApps, blockchain, optimistic rollups, gas fees, decentralization
title: Arbitrum and Transaction Batching: Revolutionizing the Ethereum Landscape
